lead_paragraph: A Bristol-Myers drug shows promise in treating a heart rhythm disorder, and others combat postsurgical clotting and deep vein thrombosis.
snippet: A Bristol-Myers drug shows promise in treating a heart rhythm disorder, and others combat postsurgical clotting and deep vein thrombosis.

headline.main: New Rivals to Warfarin as Blood Clot Preventer
headline.seo: New Drugs Rival Warfarin as Blood Clot Preventer
headline.print_headline: New Rivals to Warfarin As Blood Clot Preventer
